title: QKart-E-Commerce Web Application
discription: A full-featured e-commerce web application that allows users to browse products, add items to cart, and place orders with a smooth user experience. React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, REST APIs

title: Bot AI-Intelligent Chat Assistant
discription: An AI-powered chatbot that responds to user queries in real time, providing smart and interactive conversations through a simple interface. JavaScript, AI API, HTML, CSS

title: Browser Extension-Extension Manager UI
discription: A browser extension interface that allows users to manage and toggle extensions easily with a clean and responsive UI. HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON

title: Medify-Healthcare Finder App
discription: A web application that helps users find hospitals across U.S. states with slot availability using a clean and user-friendly interface. React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, REST API

title: Expense Tracker-Personal Finance App
discription: A web application that helps users track income and expenses, manage budgets, and view spending summaries through a simple interface. JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Local Storage.

title: Pricing Slider-Interactive UI Component
discription: An interactive pricing slider that dynamically updates pricing based on user input, providing a smooth and responsive user experience. HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

title: QEvent-Event Management Web App
discription: A web application that allows users to browse events, view details, and manage event information through a simple and interactive interface. React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, REST APIs

title: Qtify-Music Album Explorer
discription: Qtify is a responsive music album web application built using React.js. It fetches real-time album data from a REST API and allows users to browse, search, and filter music albums seamlessly.

title: QTrip Dynamic
discription: QTrip Dynamic is a React-based travel web application that fetches destination and adventure data dynamically from APIs. It allows users to browse locations, apply filters, sort results, and view detailed adventure information with a responsive UI.

title: Ticket Generator – Event Ticket Creator
discription: A web app that generates personalized event tickets based on user input, allowing users to preview and download the ticket instantly.HTML, CSS, JavaScript

title: QTrip Static – Travel Destination Website
discription: A static travel website that showcases destinations with detailed pages, images, and structured layouts for easy exploration.HTML, CSS, JavaScript

title: Calculator – Basic Arithmetic App
discription: A simple calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations with a clean and responsive interface. HTML, CSS, JavaScript

title: Advice Generator-Random Advice App
discription: A simple web application that fetches and displays random advice from an API with a clean and responsive user interface. HTML, CSS, JavaScript, REST API.
